title: LReal Array Min/Max Value and Index Searcher
name: LGF_SearchMinMax_LReal
description: This function searches, in an array of the data type LReal, for the maximum and minimum value and the respective index in the array.

output.name: minValue
output.description: Minimum value found in the array

output.name: minValueIndex
output.description: Index of the minimum found value in the array

output.name: maxValue
output.description: Maximum value found in the array

output.name: maxValueIndex
output.description: Index of the maximum found value in the array

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: Array in whose fields the maximum and minimum are searched

description_zh: 该函数用于在LReal类型的数组中查找最小值和最大值，并返回它们在数组中的相应索引。函数接受一个LReal类型的数组作为输入，并输出四个值：最小值、最小值索引、最大值和最大值索引。函数首先获取数组的上下界，然后从数组的第二个元素开始遍历，比较每个元素的值，记录下最小值和最大值及其索引。最后，将找到的最小值和最大值以及它们的索引复制到输出参数中。
